replies.body:
Hmmm, this issue is pretty rare but has typically been caused by a few different settings. The most common solution for this is to configure League to launch in a compatibility mode for Windows 7. I recommend using [**this guide**](https://www.windows10forums.com/articles/compatibility-mode.7/) to make that change to your League shortcut on the desktop.

Let me know if this resolved the issue for you.
Sorry just seeing this now! Unfortunatlly this did not work, next thing we can try please?

I'd like to escalate this to our tech team. In order to do that, we'll need you to run a set of logs using our [**HRT App**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [**support ticket.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you ran into any issues.
